However, SpaceX says it still considers Thursday's mission a success and says Starship experienced a, quote, unscheduled rapid disassembly prior to stage separation. sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: More solidarity among EU member states in managing migratory pressure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: That's the goal of the European Parliament after approving on Thursday three key proposals on migration that aim to end the years-long standoff between E.U. member states on how to deal with the issue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The principle of the so-called Dublin regulation, which means that every asylum seeker coming to Europe should present their request in the country of first entry, remains valid, but with more exceptions like the family or educational ties of migrants.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: According to MEPs, though, solidarity between EU countries should be expressed in different ways.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Well, it's binding to make sure that every member state contributes, but then what we offer from the European Parliament is that we should have flexible options, that we will see some member states that will work with relocation, others might work with capacity building. And this is because we want to open up the deadlock that we have seen for years, because something needs to happen now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The vote by MEPs establishes the European Parliament's stance in negotiations on the issue with the EU Council. If the Parliament gets its way, physical relocations would still apply under normal circumstances, but would become binding when a member state calls it a crisis situation. The Commission would then have to assess the crisis request and, if confirmed, set quotas of migrants to be deployed to the other countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Solidarity may have a chance. Solidarity when it comes to emergency crisis situations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: That's precisely the point of this regulation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Mandatory relocation is a key point for Mediterranean countries like Italy, which has this year seen a 300% increase of migrants by sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The system of voluntary relocations which is currently in place has not worked well.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Despite several thousand pledges, only a few hundred people have so far been transferred from Italy to other member states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Negotiations between the parliament and council are unlikely to be easy given the years of tension.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
